Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.messages

Class OperationLifecycleMessage

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.messages.OperationMessage
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.messages.OperationLifecycleMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, Triaged, Transmittable, Named, Stringable, StringSource
Direct Known Subclasses:
OperationFailed, OperationHalted, OperationStarted, OperationSucceeded
public abstract class OperationLifecycleMessage extends OperationMessage
A message representing a state transition in the lifecycle of an operation. For example, an operation may have failed or succeeded or someone may need to be alerted of a serious problem.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
See Also:
OperationStarted, OperationSucceeded, OperationFailed, OperationHalted
